title: Chinese firms turn to AI-generated fake couples and families to fleece unsuspecting British shoppers
description: Unscrupulous foreign companies are using artificial intelligence to create fake photos and backstories of so-called family-run UK businesses to dupe British shoppers into parting with their cash.
content:
They look like the sort of people you’d happily invite round for a cup of tea or perhaps buy a pretty trinket from online.

title: Tourists turning to artificial intelligence for holiday inspiration
description: Abta's 2025-26 Holiday Habits report says that more people are using AI to research, plan and inspire their next trips away.
content:
More holidaymakers are using artificial intelligence (AI) to inspire their next trips away, a new report has found.
AI has made its way into almost every sector, and according to Abta’s latest Holiday Habits report, the travel industry is no exceptio... [2753 chars]

title: RBC retains top spot, TD stumbles as AI race in banking intensifies
description: RBC ranks third in the world for advancement in artificial intelligence, trailing only JPMorgan Chase and Capital One. Read more
content:

title: State AI laws = economic, legal & security risks
description: Artificial intelligence is driving what amounts to a new industrial revolution. But instead of waiting to see how the technology matures, states are rushing to regulate it — risking a confusing patchwork of rules before a truly national (let alone global) AI market can even form.

title: Hollywood, Bollywood groups lobby Indian panel to protect content from AI models
description: Hollywood and Bollywood groups are lobbying an Indian panel for stricter copyright protection that will prevent artificial intelligence firms from using their intellectual property to train AI models, letters show.
content:
NEW DELHI, Oct 8 (Reuters) - Hollywood and Bollywood groups are lobbying an Indian panel for stricter copyright protection that will prevent artificial intelligence firms from using their intellectual property to train AI models, letters show.

title: CFA Level I Pass Rate Drops to 43% as AI Models Ace Final Exam
description: The pass rate for the first level of the chartered financial analyst exam fell to 43% for humans even as artificial-intelligence models have advanced to the point they can ace the final and hardest level of the exam in minutes.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- The pass rate for the first level of the chartered financial analyst exam fell to 43% for humans even as artificial-intelligence models have advanced to the point they can ace the final and hardest level of the exam in minutes.

title: Softbank Takes Over ABB Robotics In A $5.4 Billion Deal To Bolster AI Portfolio
description: SoftBank Group (OTC: SFTBY) (OTC: SFTBF) said on Wednesday it will buy the robotics division of Swiss engineering firm ABB (OTC: ABBNY) in a $5.4 billion deal, as the Japanese firm looks to boost its artificial intelligence portfolio.
content:

description: As agentic artificial intelligence becomes widespread, a new cyberattack vector—vibe hacking—is emerging, raising alarms among security experts. What makes vibe hacking so dangerous and difficult to detect? How could vibe hacking be fought?

title: EU rolls out $1.1 billion plan to ramp up AI in key industries amid sovereignty drive
description: The European Commission on Wednesday announced a 1-billion-euro ($1.1 billion) plan to ramp up the use of artificial intelligence in key industries amid a push to cut the European Union's reliance on U.S. and Chinese technologies.

title: Early Career Scientists Urge Ethical and Inclusive AI for Weather Forecasting
description: Artificial Intelligence is revolutionizing the way scientists analyze climate data, predict extreme weather, and model atmospheric processes.
